values.name: Equitable
values.description: Use power and wealth to empower and enrich others

values.name: Healthy
values.description: Prioritize physical and mental health. Optimize for human health over profit

values.name: Empirical
values.description: Rely on scientific evidence and expert research. Stay humble

values.name: Transparent
values.description: Truth is essential for success and leads to improvements

values.name: Consensual
values.description: Seek consent everywhere. Collaborate toward mutually beneficial outcomes

values.name: Inclusive
values.description: Support neurodiversity and independence. Foster safe spaces for dissent, creativity, and emotional processing

values.name: Future-proof
values.description: Think long-term. Adapt to change while protecting marginalized groups

values.name: Focused
values.description: Stay committed to meaningful goals. Pivot only when a clearly better path emerges

worldview: Optimistic but realistic; believes in human potential and continuous improvement
